course.subject: LANG
course.name: English Seminar and Presentation Skills
course.description: This one-term course aims at enhancing the spoken English of research postgraduate students in the Interdisciplinary Programs Office. The course focuses on developing appropriate English skills for participation in academic seminars and giving effective presentations of the students' own research. Students who fail to fulfill the spoken English language requirement of the University are advised to take LANG 5000 before enrolling for this course (for students admitted in 2009/10 and onward).
